mapper.select: select * from ( select g.seq,g.writer_id,g.title, g.contents, g.start_date, g.end_date, m.profile, row_number() over(order by seq desc) rnum from grouplist g inner join member m on g.writer_id = m.id where start_date <= #{value} and #{value} <= end_date ) where rnum <= 2

select * from ( select l.seq,l.id,l.title, l.curriculum, l.start_date, l.end_date, m.profile, row_number() over(order by seq desc) rnum from lesson l inner join member m on l.id = m.id where start_date <= #{value} and #{value} <= end_date ) where rnum <= 2
select g.writer_name, g.hobby_type, g.location, g.location_lat, g.location_lng, m.profile, m.id from grouplist g inner join member m on g.writer_id = m.id and g.location = #{value}
select g.name, g.title, g.category, g.location, g.location_lat, g.location_lng, m.profile, m.id from lesson g inner join member m on g.id = m.id and g.location = #{value}
